description: This C source file provides the implementation of a function to create a new Bmc2 Env Controller object, part of the Broadway Management Console v2.0 system. It includes licensing information, comments describing the module, and the implementation of the 'Bmc2CreateEnvController' function that calls an internal constructor.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE Bmc2CreateEnvController(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new Bmc2 Env Controller object using provided context handles.
